option.name: title_text
option.value: Module 2 Getting Started with Step Up

string_table.name: pxabnsnfns10111101101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip Navigation. Hit enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: What are the Goals of This Presentation?
How Do I Contact My Student?
What Happens If I Can’t Reach My Student?
Where Should I Meet My Student?
What Are the Goals of Our First Meeting?
What Else Do I Need to Do at the First Meeting?
How Long Should I Meet With My Student the First Time?
What Are the Most Important Things to Remember?

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript:
<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Thank you, Coach! 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="That’s about it! Hopefully, you are feeling comfortable and are looking forward to your first meeting. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Don’t lose sight of how important your new role is. You will be making a huge difference in a student’s life. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Thank you again for joining the Step UP team. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Let the fun begin!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
